revision.text: Possibly: Essays : on the nature and immutability of truth, in opposition to Sophistry and Scepticism : on poetry and music, as they affect the mind : on laughter, and ludicrous composition : on the utility of classical learning / by James Beattie, LL. D. Professor of Moral Philosophy and Logic in the Marischal College and University of Aberdeen. (Edinburgh : Printed for William Creech, MDCCLXXVI [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1855618~S1
